notifications.delete_entity_body: {{title}} has passed into the endless night.
notifications.delete_record_body: And we're sorry to see it go.
notifications.email_failure: Manifold was unable to send a test email.
notifications.email_failure_body: Please check that your email configuration is correct.
notifications.email_success: The test email appears to have been sent.
notifications.entitlement_import_success_body: Manifold is processing your upload. Entitlements for existing users will be added directly to the project or journal. Entitlements for pending users will appear here shortly. Refresh the list or come back to this page in a few minutes to view them.
notifications.resource_collection_delete: The resource collection has been destroyed.
notifications.volume_body: Volume #{{number}} has passed into the endless night.
